text: Luis Alberto Larrea Alba (25 October 1894 - 17 April 1979) was a military officer and acting President of Ecuador in from 24 August to 15 October 1931. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1894 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil
title: Luis Larrea Alba
